Class w3c.thotlib.Extra 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----w3c.thotlib.Extra
public class Extra
extends Object
Java Classe for all native functions not generated automatically by javastub.

This is all the native functions needed to make the interface between the native code and the Java side and wich are not automatically generated. The machine generated basic classes Are prefixed by "API".

Extra functions needed for event control.

Actions registering/unregistering mechanisms.

Function using ElementType or AttributeType variables since these are difficult to convert to/from C structures.

Extra()

AddEditorActionEvent(String, int, int, boolean)
AddEditorActionEvent : Add an action at the Application level, (equivalent to EDITOR.A actions).
AddSSchemaActionEvent(String, String, int, int, boolean)
AddSSchemaActionEvent : Add an action at the SSchema level, (equivalent to HTML.A actions).
JavaPollLoop()
Call the poll loop.
JavaRegisterAction(Action, String)
JavaRegisterAction : Register an Action handler
JavaRegisterMenuAction(Action, String)
JavaRegisterMenuAction : Register an Menu Action callback
JavaStartApplet(String, String, int, String[])
Start an applet

May throw ClassNotFoundException or NoSuchMethodError.

JavaStopPoll()
Stop the poll loop.
JavaUnregisterAction(String)
JavaUnregisterAction : Unregister an Action handler
JavaUnregisterMenuAction(String)
JavaUnregisterMenuAction : Unregister an Menu Action callback
JavaXFlush()
Flushes the X Events.
TtaCreateDescent(int, long, ElementType)
Creation of an child of a given ElementType
TtaCreateDescentWithContent(int, long, ElementType)
Creation of an initialized child of a given ElementType
TtaGetAttribute(long, AttributeType)
get the Attribute of a given AttributeType held by an element.
TtaGetElementType(ElementType, long)
Read in the ElementType of an element.
TtaGetElementTypeName(long, int)
Get the ElementType's name

Creation of an attribute of a given AttributeType
TtaNewButton(int, ButtonCallback, String, String)
Creation of a new Button
TtaNewElement(int, ElementType)
Creation of an element of a given ElementType
TtaNewTree(int, ElementType, String)
Creation of an new tree of a given ElementType
TtaSearchAttribute(AttributeType, int, long, Element, Attribute)
Perform a search for an Attribute of a given type
TtaSearchTypedElement(ElementType, int, Element)
Perform a search for an Element of a given type

 public Extra()

 public static native void JavaPollLoop()
Call the poll loop.

JavaXFlush 
 public static native void JavaXFlush()
Flushes the X Events.

JavaStartApplet 
 public static native int JavaStartApplet(String classname,
                                          String signature,
                                          int doc,
                                          String argv[]) throws ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchMethodError
Start an applet

May throw ClassNotFoundException or NoSuchMethodError.

Parameters:
classname - the class name of the applet.
signature - the signature name of the applet main().
doc - the document number given as parameter.
argv - the array of String given as parameters.
JavaRegisterAction 
 public static native void JavaRegisterAction(Action handler,
                                              String ActionName)
JavaRegisterAction : Register an Action handler

Parameters:
handler - The Action object to register
ActionName - The name under which this action should be registered.
JavaRegisterMenuAction 
 public static native void JavaRegisterMenuAction(Action handler,
                                                  String ActionName)
JavaRegisterMenuAction : Register an Menu Action callback

Parameters:
handler - The Action object to register
ActionName - The name under which this action should be registered.
JavaUnregisterAction 
 public static native void JavaUnregisterAction(String ActionName)
JavaUnregisterAction : Unregister an Action handler

Parameters:
ActionName - The name under which this action had been registered.
JavaUnregisterMenuAction 
 public static native void JavaUnregisterMenuAction(String ActionName)
JavaUnregisterMenuAction : Unregister an Menu Action callback

Parameters:
ActionName - The name under which this action had been registered.
AddEditorActionEvent 
 public static native void AddEditorActionEvent(String ActionName,
                                                int eventType,
                                                int typeId,
                                                boolean pre)
AddEditorActionEvent : Add an action at the Application level, (equivalent to EDITOR.A actions). An action with the corresponding ActionName MUST have been registered before (see Action and SampleAction classes).

Parameters:
ActionName - The name under which the handler had been registered
eventType - The type of event to catch (APIAppAction.TteXXX)
typeId - The element type (or other basic type) selection
pre - A boolean indicating if the action should be raised before or after the editing action.
AddSSchemaActionEvent 
 public static native void AddSSchemaActionEvent(String DTDName,
                                                 String ActionName,
                                                 int eventType,
                                                 int typeId,
                                                 boolean pre)
AddSSchemaActionEvent : Add an action at the SSchema level, (equivalent to HTML.A actions). An action with the corresponding ActionName MUST have been registered before (see Action and SampleAction classes).

Parameters:
DTDName, - string designing the external name of the document type (e.g. "HTML");
ActionName - The name under which the handler had been registered
eventType - The type of event to catch (APIAppAction.TteXXX)
typeId - The element type (or other basic type) selection
pre - A boolean indicating if the action should be raised before or after the editing action.
TtaGetElementType 
 public static native void TtaGetElementType(ElementType elType,
                                             long el)
Read in the ElementType of an element.

Parameters:
elType - the ElementType object
el - the element reference.
TtaGetElementTypeName 
 public static native String TtaGetElementTypeName(long sschema,
                                                   int type)
Get the ElementType's name

Parameters:
sschema - the SSchema parameter
type - the type number
Returns:
a String or null if not found
TtaNewAttribute 
 public static native long TtaNewAttribute(AttributeType atType)
Creation of an attribute of a given AttributeType

Parameters:
atType - the AttributeType
Returns:
the internal value for the new Attribute
TtaGetAttribute 
 public static native long TtaGetAttribute(long element,
                                           AttributeType atType)
get the Attribute of a given AttributeType held by an element.

Parameters:
element - the internal value for the Element
atType - the AttributeType object
Returns:
the internal value for the new Attribute
TtaSearchAttribute 
 public static native void TtaSearchAttribute(AttributeType atType,
                                              int scope,
                                              long element,
                                              Element el,
                                              Attribute at)
Perform a search for an Attribute of a given type

Parameters:
atType - the AttributeType object to search for
scope - the scope of the search.
element - the internal value for the Element used as a starting point
el - the Element object returned
at - the Attribute object returned
Returns:
the internal value for the new Attribute
TtaNewElement 
 public static native long TtaNewElement(int document,
                                         ElementType elType)
Creation of an element of a given ElementType

Parameters:
document - the document number
elType - the ElementType object
Returns:
the internal value for the new Element
TtaNewTree 
 public static native long TtaNewTree(int document,
                                      ElementType elType,
                                      String label)
Creation of an new tree of a given ElementType

Parameters:
document - the document number
elType - the ElementType object
label - the String used as a label (or null)
Returns:
the internal value for the new Element

 public static native long TtaSearchTypedElement(ElementType elType,
                                                 int scope,
                                                 Element el)
Perform a search for an Element of a given type

Parameters:
elType - the ElementType object to search for
scope - the scope of the search.
el - the Element used as a starting point
Returns:
the internal value for the new Attribute
TtaCreateDescent 
 public static native long TtaCreateDescent(int document,
                                            long element,
                                            ElementType elType)
Creation of an child of a given ElementType

Parameters:
document - the document number
element - the parent of the new element.
elType - the ElementType object
Returns:
the internal value for the new Element
TtaCreateDescentWithContent 
 public static native long TtaCreateDescentWithContent(int document,
                                                       long element,
                                                       ElementType elType)
Creation of an initialized child of a given ElementType

Parameters:
document - the document number
element - the parent of the new element.
elType - the ElementType object
Returns:

TtaNewButton 
 public static native int TtaNewButton(int document,
                                       ButtonCallback callback,
                                       String imgName,
                                       String infos)
Creation of a new Button

Parameters:
document - the document number
callback - the callback
imgName - a registered image name
infos - a description string for the tooltip
Returns:
the number for the new button, or -1 in case of failure.
